content: double_crochet r14- repeat r5 48 double_crochet if you d like to increase the length of the bag you can simply repeat r5 here as many times as you like r15- repeat r7 16 ch5sp 16 single_crochet r16- repeat r8 16 ch5sp 16 single_crochet r17- repeat r9 16 ch5sp 16 single_crochet r18- repeat r10 16 ch5sp 16 single_crochet r19- repeat r11 48 double_crochet r20- repeat r12 48 double_crochet r21- repeat r4 yes round four - 48 half_double_crochet r22- ch3 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next stitch decrease double_crochet in next 2 stitches decrease 11 times slip_stitch to top of ch3 36 stitches r23- ch3 1st double_crochet decrease double_crochet in next stitch decrease 11 times slip_stitch in top of ch3 24 stitches r24- ch1 single_crochet in same stitch and each stitch around slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 24 single_crochet handle- ch25 skip 2 stitches from r24 single_crochet in next stitch of r24 single_crochet in next stitch of 24 again ch1 turn work single_crochet in each of the 25 chains or you may evenly place 25 single_crochet around the ch25 single_crochet in next st of r24 fasten_off and weave in any ends stuff it full of plastic bags and hang
